1594178844_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body:
This really depends on local law though.  
In most places (like The Netherlands), it is technically speaking illegal to rip a DVD as you are breaking the "protection" that is in place that was meant to prevent copying.
Sure, it was horrible and court will probably laugh pretty badly at it as well but legally speaking, ripping DVDs is illegal *if* it is illegal to break protections on the content, how bad the protection may be.
